verses.verse: In <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, I take <S%H2620>refuge.<s%> <S%H408>Never<s%> let me be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6403>rescue<s%> <S%H5186>me.<s%> Turn your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H3467>me,<s%> and save me.

Be to me a <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H4583>refuge<s%> to which I may <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H935>go.<s%> Give the <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5553>me,<s%> for you are my rock and my <S%H4686>fortress.<s%>
<S%H6403>Rescue<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> my God, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>unrighteous<s%> and cruel <S%H2556>man.<s%>
For you are my <S%H8615>hope,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh;<s%> my <S%H4009>confidence<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>
I have <S%H5564>relied<s%> on you from the <S%H990>womb.<s%> You are he who <S%H1491>took<s%> me out of my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H4578>womb.<s%> I will <S%H8548>always<s%> praise <S%H8416>you.<s%>
I am a <S%H4159>marvel<s%> to <S%H7227>many,<s%> but you are my <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with your <S%H8416>praise,<s%> with your <S%H8597>honor<s%> all the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H7993>Don't<s%> reject me in my old <S%H2209>age.<s%> <S%H5800>Don't<s%> forsake me <S%H6256>when<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3615>fails.<s%>
For my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>talk<s%> about <S%H8104>me.<s%> Those who watch for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3289>conspire<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%>
<S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H7291>him.<s%> Pursue and <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H5337>him,<s%> for no one will rescue him."
<S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7368>don't<s%> be far from <S%H430>me.<s%> My God, <S%H2363>hurry<s%> to help <S%H5833>me.<s%>

Let <S%H5315>my<s%> <S%H7853>accusers<s%> be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H3615>consumed.<s%> Let them be <S%H5844>covered<s%> with <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> and <S%H3639>scorn<s%> who <S%H1245>want<s%> to harm <S%H7451>me.<s%>
But I will <S%H8548>always<s%> <S%H3176>hope,<s%> and will <S%H3254>add<s%> to <S%H3254>all<s%> of your <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will <S%H5608>tell<s%> about your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and of your <S%H8668>salvation<s%> all <S%H3117>day,<s%> though I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know its full <S%H5615>measure.<s%>
I will <S%H935>come<s%> with the <S%H1369>mighty<s%> acts of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh.<s%> I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> even of yours alone.
<S%H430>God,<s%> you have <S%H3925>taught<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%> Until <S%H5046>now,<s%> I have declared your wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>

<S%H5704>Yes,<s%> even when I am <S%H2209>old<s%> and <S%H7872>gray-haired,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5800>don't<s%> forsake <S%H5046>me,<s%> until I have declared your <S%H2220>strength<s%> to the next <S%H1755>generation,<s%> your <S%H1369>might<s%> to everyone who is to <S%H935>come.<s%>
Your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H430>also,<s%> God, reaches to the <S%H4791>heavens;<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1419>things.<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> who is like you?

<S%H7200>You,<s%> who have shown us <S%H7227>many<s%> and <S%H7451>bitter<s%> <S%H6869>troubles,<s%> you will <S%H7725>let<s%> me <S%H2421>live.<s%> You will bring us <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H8415>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H7235>Increase<s%> my <S%H1420>honor,<s%> and <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me <S%H5437>again.<s%>

I will also <S%H3034>praise<s%> you with the <S%H3627>harp<s%> for your <S%H571>faithfulness,<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%> I <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to you with the <S%H3658>lyre,<s%> Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall shout for <S%H7442>joy!<s%> My <S%H5315>soul,<s%> which you have <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> sings praises to <S%H2167>you!<s%>

My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will also <S%H1897>talk<s%> about your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> all <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H954>long,<s%> for they are disappointed, and they are <S%H954>confounded,<s%> who <S%H1245>want<s%> to harm <S%H7451>me.<s%>
